characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If your army is Battle-forged, all INFANTRY, BIKERS and HELBRUTE units in a WORLD EATERS Detachment gain the following ability: When a unit with this trait makes a successful charge, you can make one additional attack with each of its models in the subsequent Fight phase.

profiles.name: Butcher's Nails
profiles.book: Codex Heretic Astartes - Chaos Space Marines
